Description: You shoot out a powerful vortex of air that shreds through creatures. Any creature caught in a 50 foot line, 5 feet wide, must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking flying damage on a fail, and half as much on a save.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 7d12 at level 17.
